name: March of The Abyss
description:
Note: March of The Abyss's latest version is not functioniong correctly so for this video and the available download it is a reverted version that is available. The game will be fixed as soon as possible.

This demo is still here to showcase the world and all the features that suddenly broke before release. 

March of The Abyss is a Diablo-esque RPG game that in its entirety encompass 4 areas and a boss fight, which can be seen in the demonstration video.

Made for Game Studio module submission in 3rd year of study at UEL. 

Try to enjoy this simple WIP demo, issues will be fixed as soon as possible. 

Thank you!
